metadata.Title: CVE-2020-13558 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.Description: A code execution vulnerability exists in the AudioSourceProviderGStreamer functionality of Webkit WebKitGTK 2.30.1. A specially crafted web page can lead to a use after free.

notes.Note: jdstrand> webkit receives limited support. For details, see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/FAQ#webkit webkit in Ubuntu uses the JavaScriptCore (JSC) engine, not V8

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
webkit2gtk package in hirsute was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.30.5').
wpewebkit package in hirsute is affected and may need fixing.
